00048 /* Exported constants --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00049 
00050 /* For ht32_usbd_descriptor.c                                                                               */
00051 #define COMMUNICATION_INF_CLASS           (DESC_CLASS_02_CDC_CTRL)
00052 #define COMMUNICATION_INF_SUBCLASS        (CDC_SUBCLASS_ABS)
00053 #define COMMUNICATION_INF_PTCO            (CDC_PROTOCOL_AT)
00054 
00055 #define DATA_INF_CLASS                    (DESC_CLASS_0A_CDC_DATA)
00056 #define DATA_INF_SUBCLASS                 (CDC_SUBCLASS_NULL)
00057 #define DATA_INF_PTCO                     (CDC_PROTOCOL_NULL)
00058 
00059 /* CDC related definition                                                                                   */
00060 #define CDC_HEADER_LEN                    (0x05)
00061 #define CDC_ABSTRACT_LEN                  (0x04)
00062 #define CDC_UNION_LEN                     (0x05)
00063 #define CDC_CALL_LEN                      (0x05)
00064 
00065 #define CDC_TYPE_24_INF                   (0x24)
00066 
00067 #define CDC_SUBTYPE_HEADER                (0x00)
00068 #define CDC_SUBTYPE_CALL                  (0x01)
00069 #define CDC_SUBTYPE_ABSTRACT              (0x02)
00070 #define CDC_SUBTYPE_UNION                 (0x06)
00071 
00072 #define CDC_SUBCLASS_NULL                 (0x00)
00073 #define CDC_SUBCLASS_ABS                  (0x02)
00074 
00075 #define CDC_PROTOCOL_NULL                 (0x00)
00076 #define CDC_PROTOCOL_AT                   (0x01)
00077 
00078 /* Exported types ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00079 typedef struct _VCP_LINE_CODING
00080 {
00081   u32 dwDTERate;      //Bit rate;
00082   u8  bCharFormat;    //Stop bits:
00083                       //0 = 1   Stop bit
00084                       //1 = 1.5 Stop bit
00085                       //2 = 2   Stop bit
00086   u8  bParityType;    //parity:
00087                       //0 = None
00088                       //1 = Odd
00089                       //2 = Even
00090                       //3 = Mark
00091                       //4 = Space
00092   u8  bDataBits;      //Number of data bits (7,8,9)
00093 }USBDClass_VCP_LINE_CODING;
00094 
00095 /* Exported functions --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00096 void USBDClass_Init(USBDCore_Class_TypeDef *pClass);
00097 s32 USBDClass_CDC_Tx(u32 *pFrom, u32 len);
